synopsis: Kaoru takes Hajime with her down a trip on memory lane. (Source: Wikipedia)
Kaoru's insecurities about her marriage are raised by compatibility tests. (Source: Wikipedia)
In an attempt to curb his voracious collection of anime figurines, Hajime strikes up an interest in bowling (no pun intended.... though we can't say the same about the title). (Source: Wikipedia)
Mayotama gets an assistance job through Kaoru.

title.jp: Watashi wo Ryokan ni Tsurete tte

synopsis: Miki brings everyone along on a trip to a hot spring.
Nozomu tells Hajime about how he met Rino. The episode is adapted from a spin-off of the same name.
Hajime goes to a manga convention, where he discusses his marriage to Kaoru with Miki-san.
A look into Hajime's and Mayotama's past.
Kaoru and Hajime visit Hajime's parents, who chastise him for not getting a job.
After hearing about a cheating husband, Kaoru remembers competing with a colleague for Hajime's affection.

title.jp: Kachi no Omosa to Omosa no Kachi

synopsis: Continues from where season 1 had ended.
Kaoru and Hajime consider how the baby will affect their futures.
Series finale. Everyone gathers to think of a name for Kaoru's and Hajime's child.
